column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Lived in Chicago for 3 years and already been here at least 15 times. It's incredible! Fun atmosphere
column2: great for dates or big groups (went for a bachelorette party and they easily accommodated 15 people at one table). The tapas are amazing and inexpensive ($5-10 on average per tapa
column3: plan to get about 2 per person
column5: cheaper during happy hour at the bar.
